error.network_error: The Mastodon instance was not found.
error.unknown: Unknown error occured when connecting to the Mastodon instance.

data_description.access_token: The access token for the application created within your Mastodon account.
data_description.base_url: The URL of your Mastodon instance e.g. https://mastodon.social.
data_description.client_id: The client key for the application created within your Mastodon account.
data_description.client_secret: The client secret for the application created within your Mastodon account.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_network_err.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed but no instance was found while importing your existing configuration.
Please use the UI to configure Mastodon. Don't forget to delete the YAML configuration.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_network_err.title: YAML import failed because the instance was not found

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unauthorize.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed but there was an authentication error while importing your existing configuration.
Please use the UI to configure Mastodon. Don't forget to delete the YAML configuration.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unauthorize.title: YAML import failed due to an authentication error

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed but there was an unknown error while importing your existing configuration.
Please use the UI to configure Mastodon. Don't forget to delete the YAML configuration.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: YAML import failed with unknown error
